traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its light crossbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
